name: Flutterglow
description:
A simple game where you get help from your fellow butterflies to find your missing colours and restore your rainbow hue. 

Made for Nordic Game Jam Online 2020.

Controls

W/A/S/D - move

ESCAPE - quit

Credits

Game by DrNoble

Music by courtesy of 

Sergey Cheremisinov - Northern Lullaby

Scott Holmes - Storybook
